mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Julia E. Pratt, She reached 21 Years of Age 01.20.1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Julia E. Pratt, She reached 21 Years of Age 01.20.1896 Guardianship of Charlotte M. Pratt, Until she reached 21 years of age about a month before 10.18.1899 Mary J. Pratt, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 5, page 83, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
